title: [COMPLETE] Scheduled Maintenance - Store - 24/09/2015 @ 5:00am AEST
body:
Hi all,

Tomorrow morning (Sept 24th) we'll be doing some planned maintenance to the servers that power the store, starting at 5:00am AEST (Sydney time).  During this time it won't be possible to perform store transactions - eg. purchasing skins & champions.  We anticipate that the store will be unavailable for approximately 2 hours.   

Let me know if you have any questions.

Cheers,
Mindstar

replies.body:
I'm not sure if there is a problem with today's shop maintenance but you can't buy anything at the moment. I've created a thread and many people are also experiencing the same issue. We have enough IP to buy a champion but the store says we don't, as if we are missing IP. 

The thread explains more. The link is:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/FKoAQK2M-not-enough-ip-bug

It would be great if this bug is fixed because it's really annoying.
Why i can't buy championship Kalista skin in the game ?
